title: Guiyang South China Stay Steps from Qingyan Ancient Town
description: Immerse yourself in the ancient history of the Ming Dynasty at Qingyan Ancient Town while staying in modern comfort at Holiday Inn Resort Guiyang Qingyan, an IHG Hotel. Walk the city walls - just a five-minute walk from the resort - find moments of zen at Hongfu Temple or connect with nature within the verdant wetlands of Huaxi Wetland Park. After exploring cosmopolitan Guiyang, dine on delectable dishes at Hi Bowl restaurant before savouring an ice-cold cocktail at the Lobby Bar.
location_description: Holiday Inn Resort Guiyang Qingyan, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.191A, Longjing Village, Qingyan Town, Huaxi District, Guiyang, Guizhou, China, 550027

title: Sky-High Sofitel Luxury in Guiyang CBD with Three Restaurants & Bars, Indoor Pool & Spa
description:
Discover an unparalleled retreat at a five-star sanctuary nestled in the dynamic heart of Guiyang. Just moments from the iconic Jiaxiu Pavilion and the scenic Nanming district, this exquisite hotel unites cultural heritage with sophisticated bliss.

Unwind in elegantly appointed rooms offering sweeping views of the glittering city skyline. Indulge in ultimate relaxation at the luxurious Sofitel SPA or take a refreshing dip in the indoor heated pool. Tuck into the bold flavours of Sichuan and authentic Guizhou cuisine at LE CHINOIS, or elevate your evening with a handcrafted cocktail at LE BAR, perched on the 55th floor with breathtaking panoramic vistas.

title: Modern Guiyang City Escape near Airport with Onsite Dining
description:
Immerse yourself in the vibrant energy of Guiyang from a prime location in the city's bustling commercial district. This stylish retreat places you within easy reach of the city's most popular attractions, including the ancient Nanming District, picturesque Huaxi National City Wetland Park and historic Jiaxiu Tower.

Surrounded by a plethora of local eateries, shops and cultural landmarks, Novotel Guiyang Downtown is near Guiyang Railway Station, making it the perfect base for your urban exploration. After a day of sightseeing, retreat to the hotel to enjoy a refreshing drink at one of the refined onsite lounges, or keep active in the modern fitness centre.
offer_address: 8, Zhonghua South Road, Nanming District, Guiyang, Guizhou 550002, China

title: China Guizhou Mountain Spa Escape with Six Restaurants & Bars
description: Escape to the mountains at the serene Anantara Guiyang Resort, a five-star resort surrounded by soaring alpine views, limestone karsts and deep green forest. While you're here, the Anantara Spa offers a slice of heaven with thermal pools, signature treatments and reflexology designed to relax and recharge mind and body. The six onsite restaurants and bars offer everything from a seafood buffet and Thai fine dining to poolside cocktails - no matter what you're craving you'll find it here.
offer_address: CREC International Eco City, Shuanglong Airport Economic Zone, Guiyang, Guizhou, China
